ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was partially funded by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's Climate Change Division, under Cooperative Agreement No. XA‐83600001 and by the U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Biological and Environmental Research, under grant DE‐FG02‐94ER61937. The Joint Program on the Science and Policy of Global Change is funded by a number of federal agencies and a consortium of 40 industrial and foundation sponsors. (For the complete list see http://globalchange.mit.edu/sponsors/current.html). The data used are listed in the references.
